author: axb
msg: Yuck... so here's what a collission does while packaging a release:

author: stevehay
msg: The third test (for $url/subdir) was failing because the absence of an argument ($url?...) caused a warning that $r->arg was undefined in perlloadmodule2.pm, and the "use warnings FATAL => 'all';" line saw to it that the server returned 500/Internal Server Error in this case.
